original: ye cāpi te śāriputra sattvāstraidhātukāt parimuktā bhavanti,

original: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān ||
analyzed: tatra bhikṣavaḥ ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭi gaṅgā nadī vālukā samāni prāṇi koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavān avatāritavān

original: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena smṛtimān saṃprajānastasmāt samādhervyuttiṣṭhat |
analyzed: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūḥ tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ teṣām caturaśīteḥ kalpa sahasrāṇām atyayena smṛtimān saṃprajānaḥ tasmāt samādheḥ vyuttiṣṭhat

original: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat |
analyzed: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūḥ tathāgataḥ yena tat dharma āsanam tena upasaṃkrāmat

original: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane,
analyzed: samanantara niṣaṇṇaḥ ca khalu punar bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūḥ tathāgataḥ tasmin dharma āsane

original: atha tāvadeva sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayāmāsaāścaryaprāptā bhikṣavo'dbhutaprāptā ime ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāḥ prajñāvanto bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāścīrṇacaritā buddhajñānaparyupāsakā buddhajñānapratigrāhakā buddhājñānāvatārakā buddhajñānasaṃdarśakāḥ paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ |
analyzed: atha tāvat eva sarvāvantam parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya bhikṣu saṃgham āmantrayāmāsa āścarya prāptāḥ bhikṣavaḥ udbhuta prāptāḥ ime ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāḥ prajñāvantaḥ bahu buddha koṭī nayuta śata sahasra paryupāsitāḥ cīrṇa caritāḥ buddha jñāna paryupāsakāḥ buddha jñāna pratigrāhakāḥ buddha ajñāna avatārakāḥ buddha jñāna saṃdarśakāḥ paryupāsadhvam bhikṣavaḥ etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punar punar saṃkṣepaṇīya anup

original: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na pratikṣepsyanti |
analyzed: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śrāvaka yānikāḥ vā pratyekabuddha yānikāḥ vā bodhisattva yānikāḥ vā eṣām kula putrāṇām dharma deśanām na pratikṣepsyanti
sarve te kṣipram anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ lābhinaḥ bhaviṣyanti
sarve ca te tathāgata jñānam anuprāpsyanti

original: tai khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane'yaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃprakāśito'bhūt |
analyzed: taiḥ khalu punar bhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kula putraiḥ tasya bhagavataḥ śāsanā iyam saddharmapuṇḍarīkaḥ dharmaparyāyaḥ punar punar saṃprakāśitaḥ bhūt

original: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhāya samādāpitānyabhūvan,
analyzed: taiḥ khalu punar bhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇeraiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ yāni tāni ekaikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭi gaṅgā nadī vālukā samāni sattva koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi bodhāya samādāpitāni abhūvan

original: sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni |
analyzed: sarvāṇi ca tāni taiḥ eva sārdham tāsu tāsu jātiṣu anupravrajitāni
tāni eva samanupaśyantaḥ teṣām eva antikāt dharmam aśrauṣuḥ
taiḥ catvāriṃśat buddha koṭī sahasrāṇi ārāgitāni

original: ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
analyzed: ye te ṣoḍaśa rāja kumārāḥ kumāra bhūtāḥ ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerāḥ dharma bhāṇakāḥ abhūvan

original: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti |
analyzed: sarve ca te etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti

original: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
analyzed: daśasu dikṣu nānā buddhakṣetreṣu bahūnām śrāvaka bodhisattva koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇām dharmam deśayanti

original: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukūṭaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
analyzed: yat uta pūrvasyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ bhiratyām lokadhātau akṣobhyaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ merukūṭaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
analyzed: pūrva dakṣiṇasyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nityaparinirvṛtaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ nityaparinirvṛtaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
analyzed: dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ indradhvajaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ brahmadhvajaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
analyzed: paścimāyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ omitāyuḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavastamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukalpaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
analyzed: paścima uttarasyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ meru kalpaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
analyzed: uttarasyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ meghasvaradīpaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ meghasvararājaḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ urhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
analyzed: uttara pūrvasyām diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraḥ ca nāma tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
analyzed: aham ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamuniḥ nāma tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ madhye khalu asyām sahāyām lokadhātau anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ

original: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyasmābhiḥ samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
analyzed: ye punar te bhikṣavaḥ tadā asmākam śrāmaṇera bhūtānām sattvām dharmam śrutavantaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgā nadī vālukā samāni sattva koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi yāni asmābhiḥ samādāpitāni anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau
tāni etāni bhikṣavaḥ udya api śrāvaka bhūmau eva avasthitāni
eṣā eva eṣām ānupūrvī anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ abhisaṃbodhanāya
evam duradhimocyam hi bhikṣavaḥ tathāgata jñānam

original: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni?
analyzed: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇi asaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgā nadī vālukā samāni sattva koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi sarvajña tā dharmam anuśrāvitāni

original: yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan ||
analyzed: yūyam te bhikṣavaḥ tena kālena tena samayena sattvāḥ abhūvan

original: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgata idhvani śrāvakāḥ bhaviṣyanti
na ca avabhotsyante bodhisattvāḥ vayam iti

original: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
analyzed: kiṃca api te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇa saṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti

original: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhikṣavaḥ yat aham anyāsu lokadhātuṣu anyonyaiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ viharāmi
tatra te punar utpatsyante tathāgata jñānam paryeṣamāṇāḥ

original: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti |
analyzed: tatra ca te punar eva etām kriyām śroṣyanti
na asti anyat dvitīyam itas bahis nirvāṇam
tathāgatānām etat bhikṣavaḥ upāya kauśalyam veditavyam dharma deśanā abhinirhāraḥ ca

original: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇa kāla samayam ātmanaḥ samanupaśyati

original: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
analyzed: pariśuddham ca parṣadam paśyati adhimukti sārām śūnya dharma gatim gatām dhyānavatīm mahā dhyānavatīm

original: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati |
analyzed: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ tathāgataḥ yam kālaḥ iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarva śrāvakān ca saṃnipātya paścāt etam artham saṃśrāvayati

original: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā,
analyzed: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcid asti loke dvitīyam nāma yānam parinirvāṇam vā

original: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām-dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
analyzed: upāya kauśalyam khalu idam bhikṣavaḥ tathāgatānām arhatām dūra pranaṣṭam sattvadhātum viditvā hīna abhiratān kāma paṅka magnān
tatas eṣām bhikṣavaḥ tathāgataḥ tat nirvāṇam bhāṣate yat adhimucyante

original: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram |
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bhikṣavaḥ iha syāt pañca yojana śatikam aṭavī kāntāram

original: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya |
analyzed: mahān ca atra jana kāyaḥ pratipannaḥ bhavet ratna dīpam gamanāya

original: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām |
analyzed: deśikaḥ ca eṣām ekaḥ bhavet vyaktaḥ paṇḍitaḥ nipuṇaḥ medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalu aṭavī durgāṇām
sa ca tam sārtham aṭavīm avakrāmayet

original: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet- yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ-vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ |
analyzed: atha khalu sa mahā jana kāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klāntaḥ bhītaḥ trastaḥ evam vadet yat khalu ārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ vayam hi śrāntāḥ klāntāḥ bhītāḥ trastāḥ anirvṛtāḥ
ati dūram itas uṭavī kāntāram iti

original: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet-mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti |
analyzed: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśikaḥ upāya kuśalaḥ tān puruṣān pratinivartitu kāmān viditvā evam cintayet mā khalu ime tapasvinaḥ tādṛśam mahā ratna dvīpam na gaccheyuḥ iti
sa teṣām anukampā artham upāya kauśalyam prayojayet

original: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt |
analyzed: tasyāḥ aṭavyāḥ madhye yojana śatam vā dvi yojana śatam vā tri yojana śatam vā atikramyaḥ ṛddhi mayam nagaram abhinirmimīyāt

original: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet- mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa,
analyzed: tatas tān puruṣān evam vadet mā bhavantaḥ bhaiṣṭa

original: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam |
analyzed: atra vaḥ yāni kānicid karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam
atra nirvāṇa prāptāḥ viharadhvam atra viśrāntāḥ
sa tam mahā ratna dvīpam gamiṣyati

original: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ-muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt |
analyzed: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ te kāntāra prāptāḥ sattvāḥ āścarya prāptāḥ adbhuta prāptāḥ bhaveyuḥ muktāḥ vayam aṭavī kāntārāt

original: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
analyzed: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ te puruṣāḥ tat ṛddhi mayam nagaram praviśeyuḥ

original: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet |
analyzed: tatas tān deśikaḥ viśrāntān viditvā tat ṛddhi mayam nagaram antardhāpayet

original: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet-āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ |
analyzed: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣān evam vadeta āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ

original: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti ||
analyzed: idam tu mayā nagaram yuṣmākam viśrāmaṇa artham abhinirmitam iti

original: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yuṣmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca deśikaḥ |
analyzed: evam eva bhikṣavaḥ tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ yuṣmākam sarva sattvānām ca deśikaḥ

original: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evaṃ paśyati-mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam |

original: evaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña tena bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-ityetādṛśāścāsya guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti yādṛśāstathāgatena nirdiṣṭāḥ ||

original: asmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyapūrvayogaparivarte nirdiśyamāne caturaśītīnāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarutakauśalyānugatāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho'bhūt

original: sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña,

original: rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇād bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt prabhāṃ pramumoca,

original: yayā prabhayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ābhayā sphuṭānyabhūvan |

original: vipulena bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma |

original: atha khalu yā bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenorṇākośāt prabhā pramuktāḥ,

original: dṛṣṭapūrvāśca tena bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpā raśmyavabhāsāḥ |

original: tadyathā dhvajāgrakeyūrasamādhipratilabdhaḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkasamādhipratilabdho vimaladattasamādhipratilabdho nakṣatrarājavikrīḍitasamādhipratilabdhaḥ anilambhasamādhipratilabdho jñānamudrāsamādhipratilabdhaḥ candrapradīpasamādhipratilabdhaḥ sarvarutakauśalyasamādhipratilabdhaḥ sarvapuṇyasamuccayasamādhipratilabdhaḥ prasādavatīsamādhipratilabdhaḥ ṛddhivikrīḍitasamādhipratilabdho jñānolkāsamādhipratilabdho vyūharājasamādhipratilabdho vimalaprabhāsasamādhipratilabdho vimalagarbhasamādhipratilabdho'

original: tasya khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sā prabhā kāye nipatitābhūt |

original: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ bhagavantaṃ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,

tam ca mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam darśanāya
tam ca pradāna śūram bodhisattvam darśanāya
tam ca nakṣatrarāja saṃkusumita abhijñam bodhisattvam darśanāya

tam ca bhaiṣajya rāja samudgatam bodhisattvam darśanāya
atha khalu bhagavān kamala dala vimala nakṣatrarāja saṃkusumita abhijñaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-na tvayā kulaputra tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau gatvā hīnasaṃjñotpādayitavyā

tvam ca kula putra prāsādikaḥ darśanīya abhirūpaḥ
parama śubha varṇa puṣkara tayā samanvāgataḥ

original: tasmāttarhi kulaputra tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ gatvā mā hīnasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyasi tathāgate ca bodhisattveṣu ca tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre ||

original: sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvasvajanaparivārā tau ca dvau dārakau rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrau dvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāntapurau sāmātyau sarve sahitāḥ samagrāḥ yena bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,

original: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ ||
analyzed: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya tam bhagavantam triṣkṛtvas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ

original: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ saparivāramupasaṃkrāntaṃ viditvā dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |

original: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhāpya saputrasvajanaparivāraḥ,
analyzed: atha khalu kula putrāḥ rājā śubha vyūhaḥ tena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ tasyām velāyām tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ kanīyasaḥ bhrātuḥ paṭṭam baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhāpya sa putra sva jana parivāraḥ
sā ca vimaladattā rāja bhāryā sarva strī gaṇa parivārā

original: tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ,

analyzed: sarve sahitāḥ samagrāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārāt anagārikām pravrajitāḥ

original: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan |
analyzed: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubha vyūhaḥ sa parivāraḥ caturaśīti varṣa sahasrāṇi abhiyuktaḥ vijahāra imam saddharmapuṇḍarīkam dharmaparyāyam cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan

original: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma |

original: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau bhavataḥ |

original: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau,

original: avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi,

original: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau?

original: bhagavānāha-etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike pūjāṃ kariṣyataḥ,

original: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyataḥ sattvānāmanukampāyai,

original: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-tatsādhu bhagavan |

original: nirdiśatu tathāgataḥ-kīdṛśena jñānena samanvāgatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti,

original: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhiṣṭutya anyaiśca guṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ bhagavantamabhiṣṭutya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitabhoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvanmahārthamidaṃ tathāgataśāsanam,
analyzed: atha khalu kula putrāḥ sa rāja śubha vyūhaḥ iyadbhiḥ guṇaiḥ tam bhagavantam jaladhara garjita ghoṣa susvara nakṣatra rāja saṃkusumita abhijñam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham abhiṣṭutya anyaiḥ ca guṇa koṭī nayuta śata sahasraiḥ tam bhagavantam abhiṣṭutya tasyām velāyām tam bhagavantam jaladhara garjita bhoṣa susvara nakṣatra rāja saṃkusumita abhijñam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham etat avocata āścaryam bhagavan yāvat mahārtham idam tat

original: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,

original: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe'kṣaipsīt |

original: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ

original: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma |
analyzed: tasmin ca paryaṅke tathāgata vigrahaḥ paryaṅka baddham saṃdṛśyate sma

original: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ ||

original: atha khalu bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgataścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma-paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadantam?

original: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau |
analyzed: vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān vistīrṇavatyām lokadhātau

original: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: tasya khalu punar bhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyaḥ bodhisattva saṃghaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati |

original: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt?

original: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhūt?
analyzed: syāt khalu punar kula putrāḥ yuṣmākam kāṅkṣā vā vimatiḥ vā vicikitsā vā anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rāja bhāryā abhūt

original: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |

original: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato'bhūt |

original: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām?
analyzed: syāt khalu punar kula putrāḥ yuṣmākam kāṅkṣā vā vimatiḥ vā vicikitsā vā anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakau abhūtām

original: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
analyzed: na khalu punar kula putrāḥ yuṣmābhiḥ evam draṣṭavyam

original: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām |
analyzed: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaḥ ca bhaiṣajyasamundataḥ ca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubha vyūhasya putrau abhūtām

original: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,

original: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena ||
analyzed: te sarve namaskaraṇīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti sa devakena lokena
